attributes.additional_details:
Job Center plus, has to do more. If am not mistaken they should be help us back to work, not us keeping them in work.
Either they treat us right or pay us more. To be spoken down to like nothing,help if we are so bad.

Job Center PLUS need to sort there self out before cruticising us. They may be big but people on benefits are bigger and we should have ower opinion as well as anyone else.

rejection.details: This amounts to correspondence on a personal issue
